app.title: ISO Standards Games
app.description: Interactive educational games for learning ISO standards

quality_quest.title: QualityQuest: The Quality Challenge
quality_quest.description: Become a Quality Consultant and learn to identify the 8 quality attributes from ISO/IEC 25010 in various software scenarios.
quality_quest.intro: In QualityQuest, you'll analyze different software scenarios and identify which quality attribute from ISO/IEC 25010 is most relevant.
quality_quest.select_attribute: Which quality attribute is most relevant in this scenario?
quality_quest.feedback_correct: Great job! You correctly identified the quality attribute.
quality_quest.feedback_incorrect: Not quite. Let's learn more about this quality attribute.
